languages.text: "Цвета здесь... особенно темные и опасные. Я словно тону в бездонном океане из сизой мглы. Но... что это? Я чувствую слабый трепет, исходящий из недр шпиля. Похожий на зов Имматериума, но только намного, намного чище".

"The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."
languages.original_text: "Цвета здесь... особенно темные и опасные. Я словно тону в бездонном океане из сизой мглы. Но... что это? Я чувствую слабый трепет, исходящий из недр шпиля. Похожий на зов Имматериума, но только намного, намного чище".

traits.locale_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is like I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from the bowels of the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is like I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from the bowels of the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ici, les couleurs sont... particulièrement sombres et dangereuses. C'est comme si je me noyais dans un océan de brume sans fond. Mais... qu'est-ce donc ? Je ressens un lointain tremblement dans les profondeurs de la tour. Comme un appel de l'Immaterium, mais beaucoup plus pur. »
languages.original_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: « Ici, les couleurs sont... particulièrement sombres et dangereuses. C'est comme si je me noyais dans un océan de brume sans fond. Mais... qu'est-ce donc ? Je ressens un lointain tremblement dans les profondeurs de la tour. Comme un appel de l'Immaterium, mais beaucoup plus pur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这里的颜色……极其阴暗，极其危险，仿佛要将我淹没在灰黑色的无底深渊之中。可……那是什么感觉？我感觉到尖塔深处传来了微弱的震颤，就像亚空间的呼唤一样，但却要纯净得多。”
languages.original_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: “这里的颜色……极其阴暗，极其危险，仿佛要将我淹没在灰黑色的无底深渊之中。可……那是什么感觉？我感觉到尖塔深处传来了微弱的震颤，就像亚空间的呼唤一样，但却要纯净得多。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ここの色は…特に暗くて危険ですね。まるで底なしの霧の海に溺れているようです。でも…なんでしょう？尖塔の奥深くからかすかな揺れを感じます。非物質世界の呼び声のようですが、もっと純粋なものです」
languages.original_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: 「ここの色は…特に暗くて危険ですね。まるで底なしの霧の海に溺れているようです。でも…なんでしょう？尖塔の奥深くからかすかな揺れを感じます。非物質世界の呼び声のようですが、もっと純粋なものです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hier wirken die Farben ... besonders dunkel und gefährlich. Es fühl sich an, als würde ich ertrinken in einem bodenlosen Meer aus waberndem Nebel. Aber ... was ist das? Ich spüre eine schwache Erschütterung im Inneren des Turms. Es erinnert mich an den Ruf des Immateriums, nur viel reiner."
languages.original_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: "Hier wirken die Farben ... besonders dunkel und gefährlich. Es fühl sich an, als würde ich ertrinken in einem bodenlosen Meer aus waberndem Nebel. Aber ... was ist das? Ich spüre eine schwache Erschütterung im Inneren des Turms. Es erinnert mich an den Ruf des Immateriums, nur viel reiner."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los colores de este lugar... son especialmente oscuros y peligrosos. Es como si me estuviese ahogando en un océano caliginoso y sin fondo. Pero... ¿qué es? Noto una sutil vibración que proviene del corazón de esta torre. Es como la llamada del Inmaterio, pero mucho más pura».
languages.original_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: «Los colores de este lugar... son especialmente oscuros y peligrosos. Es como si me estuviese ahogando en un océano caliginoso y sin fondo. Pero... ¿qué es? Noto una sutil vibración que proviene del corazón de esta torre. Es como la llamada del Inmaterio, pero mucho más pura».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Buradaki renkler özellikle karanlık ve tehlikeli. Dalgalanan pustan, dipsiz bir okyanusta boğuluyorum âdeta. Dur... Bu da ne? Kulenin derinliklerinden gelen hafif bir sarsıntı hissediyorum. Tindiyar'ın çağrısı gibi ama çok daha saf."
languages.original_text: "The colours here... are especially dark and dangerous. It is as if I am drowning in a bottomless ocean of billowing haze. But... what is it? I feel a faint tremor coming from deep inside the spire. Like the call of the Immaterium, except much purer."

traits.locale_text: "Buradaki renkler özellikle karanlık ve tehlikeli. Dalgalanan pustan oluşma dipsiz bir okyanusta boğuluyorum âdeta. Ama bu da ne? Kulenin derinliklerinden gelen hafif bir sarsıntı hissediyorum. Tindiyar'ın çağrısı gibi ama çok daha saf."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
